title: MyMercy+ 12+
appDescription: Manage all your health care with one app. Upgraded features make it easier to schedule visits, search health info and connect your entire family’s care. • Find doctors, schedule or reschedule appointments • Review visit summaries, test results, medications and more • Securely communicate with your care team • Review and pay bills • Complete digital and virtual care visits, all from your phone • Manage your family’s health care from one place more

reviews.title: I don’t see the difference
reviews.review: I don’t get the point of the new app. It’s basically the same as the old one and it keeps crashing. Why is mercy so obsessed with changing everything.

reviews.title: Adds Nothing But More Marketing
reviews.review: After several years MyMercy perfected itself so it was beneficial to the patient. However, the new + version adds nothing but ways for Mercy to promote itself. More irritating to me is I can no longer use my Windows desktop to review test results, etc; in a full page readily formatable and printable format. We appreciate mobile aps as much as the next guy but there is still no substitute for a desktop computer. Please add a Windows/MAC version so your vision impaired patients are not tied to a handheld device. more

reviews.title: Why login so many times?
reviews.review: Every time I click on something, it takes me to the web screen and I have to put my password in. For every single thing I click on in the app. Results - enter password again. Messages - enter password again. Medication - enter password again. It’s easier to login to the website. At least I stay logged in and can access everything without logging in 10 times! more
